articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: India overtakes Pakistan on ICC ODI rankings, will become No 1 if…. | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Pakistan already lost its ODI No 1 ranking to Australia and now after last night's defeat, they have slipped to third rank and Team India is the new No. 2.
